casebody.data:
Case No. 12,901. SINGER v. WILSON. Patents — Practice—Oyer.

’ Oyer of letters patent referred to in the declaration is not demandable as of right; being matter of record, the defendant can obtain them if he desires them.

[Cited in Law, Pat. Dig. 590. to the point .•stated above. Nowhere reported; opinion not now accessible.]
